data.feedback: Solid Flutter foundation architecture with proper patterns (Riverpod, Dio interceptors, clean architecture). API constant mismatches exist but can be corrected during implementation since no actual API calls are made in this foundation epic.
issues: API constant mismatches: /auth/logout, /auth/forgot-password, /sharing/friends, /goals/active don't exist in backend
suggestions: Correct API constants to match actual backend routes before Story 3 implementation
Consider reading backend routes programmatically or from OpenAPI spec in future
